BLIST.TITLE: Loading data from a CSV file
BLIST.ITEM: (Outside IReport: Create a CSV file where the first row defines the name of the columns.)
Click on the Report datasources button
Click on new, select File CSV datasource and click on Next
Type a name, select the file, click on Get columns name from the first row of the file
(It seems that editing the column names in the datasource definition will break the report executionâ€¦)
In the Report inspector, create one field per column, its name must be exactly the column header in the CSV file

creating a group
In the Report inspector, right-click on the root of the tree and select Add Report Group

setting a variable which sums on a group
(This variable shall be displayed in the corresponding Group footer.)
set Variable Class to lang.java.Integer
set Calculation to Sum
set Reset type to Group
set Reset Group to the correct Group
set Increment type to none
set Increment Factory Class to empty
set Variable Expression to $V(variableToSum)
set Initial Value Expression to empty

wrapping the content in a Text Field
set Stretch With Overflow to True for the Text Field.
set Stretch Type to Relative to Tallest Object for the other components of the band.
